parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Unique Identifier for an Intuit entity (object).

parameter.name: syncToken
parameter.description: Version number of the entity.

parameter.name: isSparse
parameter.description: Boolean value to specify weather the update is a full or a sparse update.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: User recognizable name for the Item.

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: User entered description for the item that describes the details of the service or product.

parameter.name: active
parameter.description: True if active.

parameter.name: subItem
parameter.description: True if the item is a subitem; false or null indicates a top-level item.

parameter.name: parentRef
parameter.description: Reference to the item's parent entity.

parameter.name: taxable
parameter.description: True if the item is subject to tax.

parameter.name: salesTaxIncluded
parameter.description: True if the sales tax is included in the item amount, and therefore is not calculated for the transaction.

parameter.name: unitPrice
parameter.description: Monetary value of the service or product, as expressed in the home currency.

parameter.name: ratePercent
parameter.description: The tax amount expressed as a percent of charges entered in the current transaction.

parameter.name: incomeAccountRef
parameter.description: Reference to the posting account, that is, the account that records the proceeds from the sale of this item.

parameter.name: purchaseDesc
parameter.description: User entered purchase description for the item.

parameter.name: purchaseTaxIncluded
parameter.description: True if the purchase tax is included in the item amount, and therefore is not calculated for the transaction.

parameter.name: purchaseCost
parameter.description: Amount paid when buying or ordering the item, as expressed in the home currency.

parameter.name: expenseAccountRef
parameter.description: Reference to the expense account used to pay the vendor for this item.

parameter.name: assetAccountRef
parameter.description: Reference to the Inventory Asset account that tracks the current value of the inventory.

parameter.name: trackQtyOnHand
parameter.description: True if there is quantity on hand to be tracked.

parameter.name: qtyOnHand
parameter.description: Current quantity of the inventory items available for sale.

parameter.name: salesTaxCodeRef
parameter.description: Reference to the sales tax code for the Sales item.

parameter.name: purchaseTaxCodeRef
parameter.description: Reference to the purchase tax code for the item.

parameter.name: inventoryStartDate
parameter.description: Date of opening balance for the inventory transaction.
